verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Glorious freedom, wonderful freedom, newline No more in chains of sin I repine! newline Jesus the glorious emancipator, newline Now and forever He shall be mine.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Once I was bound by sin's galling fetters, newline Chained like a slave newline I struggled in vain, newline But I received a glorious freedom, newline When Jesus broke my fetters in twain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Freedom from all the carnal affections, newline Freedom from envy, hatred and strife. newline Freedom from vain and worldly ambitions, newline Freedom from all that saddened my life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Freedom from pride and all sinful follies, newline Freedom from love and glitter of gold. newline Freedom from evil, temper, and anger, newline Glorious freedom, rapture untold.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Freedom from fear with all of its torments, newline Freedom from care with all of its pain. newline Freedom in Christ my blessed Redeemer, newline He who has rent my fetters in twain.
